Slideshow

You can present a series of images that the user can scroll throw using the previous and next arrows.

To build this in HTML, you will need:

  • A container with the slideshow-container class.
  • Several divs with the slide and fade classes.
  • Each div has an image to display and a div with the slide-caption class.
  • Two anchor tags, with the previous-slide and next-slide classes.

Here is an example of it in action:

(insert code here) (show results)

The fade class is an animation, so feel free to ignore or replace it with your own. If the slideshow-container element also has the automatic class, the slideshow will advance to the next picture every 2 seconds until the user clicks on a button.

You can change the color of the slideshow buttons here:

$slideshow-button-col
